title: Burn Notice
description: Follow Kelly Maclean in book two as he contemplates the sobering direction that his solitary life has taken on the Caribbean island of Key West. He quickly becomes entangled in an explosive international blackmail scheme involving a slimy US Congressman, a senior CIA official and what may be a priceless piece of historical artwork with connections to the Nazi regime. Then rival biker gangs and a dangerous Miami mobster join the fray just as the police decide to increase their presence on the Island in search of a criminal voyeur.  When two friends from Kellyâ€™s past show up, will he continue in a downward trajectory or will they help him get his life together? Will he find himself so deep in fresh trouble that he becomes distracted and endangers those around him?  No matter what the outcome, Kelly Maclean is sure to be a heavyweight contender in this fast-paced action-thriller. One other thing is certain, too! Once Kelly and his determined friends take the fight to the criminal underworld, the eccentric tropical paradise of Key West will never again be the same!
author: Nate Hawk
